T12D4278:105b-27: nam / ga ga nam ro tsishnu: sa bi t'a /
T12D4278:105b-28: gu ru mu pu tra bishnu shi shya: bya ti
T12D4278:105b-29: h'a ra brdeshnu: sarba sa hishnu: pra tam tsa rishnu:
T12D4278:105b-30: aa langka rishnu:/ ji ltar byung ba /
T12D4278:105b-31: ni r'a lam dag las aishnu tsa'o //
T12D4278:105b-32: auta las pa tsa ba ta /
T12D4278:105b-41: bha dza las so zhes pa 'di rnams kyis aishnu tsa ste /
T12D4278:105b-42: de'i ngang tshul dang byed pa po brjod pa'o /
T12D4278:105b-46: de ba drishta b'an r'a dz'a nam y'a tsi ta b'an zhes pa de lta bu drang bar bya'o //
T12D4278:105b-47: byung ba la'o zhes spyir btang nas /
T12D4278:105b-48: byed pa po la kta ba tu'o //
T12D4278:105b-49: kta ba tu'i 'brel pa grub pa bstan pa las /
T12D4278:105b-50: bdag gis bsod nams gang bsgrubs 'gyur //
T12D4278:105b-51: de yis 'jig rten 'di mtha' dag / myur du
T12D4278:105b-52: 'jam dbyangs nyid gyur cig /'brel pa grub pa zhes
T12D4278:105b-53: bya ba'i rab tu byed pa slob dpon nyi ma'i
T12D4278:105b-54: snying pos mdzad pa 'di yongs su rdzogs so /
T12D4278:105b-56: // / legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyi brda sprod pa'i
T12D4278:105b-57: bstan bcos slob dpon chen po tsandra go mis mdzad
T12D4278:105b-59: byed pa can dang tshig sdud dang /
T12D4278:105b-61: byings las tshig ting mtha' can sgrub pa dang /
T12D4278:105b-62: byings las ming sgrub pa rnams sde tshan du bsgrigs
T12D4278:105b-63: te gsal bar 'chad pa'i bstan bcos nyung zhing rab
T12D4278:105b-64: tu gsal ba pandi ta nyi ma'i snying pos mdzad
T12D4278:105b-65: pa 'di / sa thams cad kyi dbang phyug phun
T12D4278:105b-66: sum tshogs pa'i mkhyen rab thugs rje phul du byung
T12D4278:106a-1: chos kyi rgyal po chen po spyan snga rin po
T12D4278:106a-2: che dpal ngag gi dbang phyug grags pa phyogs thams
T12D4278:106a-3: cad las rnam par rgyal ba'i lugs gnyis kyi mdun
T12D4278:106a-4: sa chen po pho brang sne'u gdong rtse'i gtsug lag
T12D4278:106a-5: khang du mthun rkyen rnams legs par stsal nas /
T12D4278:106a-6: chos kyi rje sprul sku rin po che zhva dmar
T12D4278:106a-7: cod pan 'dzin pa bzhi pa dang dpal ldan dharmma
T12D4278:106a-8: k'irtti dzny'a na shr'i bha dra'i zhal snga nas legs
T12D4278:106a-9: par bsgyur cig ces pa'i bka' lung gnang ba bzhin
T12D4278:106a-10: / brda sprod pa'i bstan bcos chen po dag thos
T12D4278:106a-11: nas cha shas tsam rig pa'i zhva lu'i btsun pa
T12D4278:106a-12: 'gos lo ts'a pa dge slong dharmma p'a la bha
T12D4278:106a-13: dra zhes bgyi bas g-yag sde lo ts'a ba'i phyag
T12D4278:106a-14: dpe las gsar du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la
T12D4278:106a-15: / phab pa'o // gzhung 'dir ma 'gyur ba dang log par bsgyur //
T12D4278:106a-16: ha cang 'gyur sogs dri mar gang gyur pa //
T12D4278:106a-17: rgya chan chos spyan dri med mnga' rnams kyis //
T12D4278:106a-18: bdag la brtse bas bzod cing bcos par gsol //
T12D4278:106a-19: gang gi dpag yas mkhyen brtse'i rnam rol gyis //
T12D4278:106a-20: gzhung bzang bsgyur ba'i shing rta bskul ba dang //
T12D4278:106a-21: bdag gis bsgyur ba la legs spyad gang thob des //
T12D4278:106a-22: mtha' yas mkha' khyab pa 'gro ba'i tshogs kun gyis //
T12D4278:106a-23: rang rang skad kyis brjod med don rtogs te //
T12D4278:106a-24: dpal ldan chos kyi dung dang gand'i dang //
T12D4278:106a-25: zab yang sgra sgrogs chos kyi rnga bo che //
T12D4278:106a-26: sgrogs mkhas ngag dbang go 'phang myur thob shog //
